channel.title: RHBA-2011:10808 - virtio-win bug fix and enhancement update
channel.description: RHBA-2011:10808 - virtio-win bug fix and enhancement update

item.title: New Advisory: RHBA-2011:10808 - virtio-win bug fix and enhancement update
item.description:
New Advisory: RHBA-2011:10808 - virtio-win bug fix and enhancement update
Release: RHEL-6.1.0
Created by: Vadim Rozenfeld (vrozenfe@redhat.com)
Bugs:
610787 - [balloon]evict windows guest free memory does not work
616685 - balloon:window guest can not keep memory change after guest restart
621834 - Poor write I/O performance of virtio-win driver
625036 - For virtio-blk driver MSISupported should be turned on by default on VISTA and higher.
625465 - virtio-serial CloseHandle & shutdown problems
630536 - Crash when running on Windows XP SMP
630830 - nic:Network become unavailable in windows 2008 x64 guest when doing netperf test
633208 - VirtIo-Serial data corruption when working on Windows XP SMP VM
633243 - [WHQL] Windows 2008 R2 guest hang when running job of "DP WLK - Hot-Add - Device Test - Verify driver support for Hot-Add CPU".
634536 - BSOD after hot-unplug a virtio-serial port
634828 - hal.dll file is missing after quit winxp guest several time
635506 - [WHQL] Win2k8-32 guest always got BSOD (0X93) during balloon testing
637713 - fail to attach virtio serial port to guest when use same nr for different virtio serial pci
669276 - [WHQL]Windows fails to do S4/S3 with virtio-win-1.1.17
669314 - (virtio-win-1.1.17) Can not generate crash dump file after BSOD of Windows guests.
669316 - [WHQL] BSOD occurs when running "CHAOS-Concurrent Hardware And OS test"
669633 - [WHQL]Job of "DPWDK-HotReplace-Device Test-Verify driver support for D3 power state" fails with getting BSOD
670713 - (virtio-win-1.1.17)Virtio serial driver always causes windows BSOD when install or run whql jobs.
671187 - .git in sources tarball
688839 - Failed to boot windows guest with 30 virtio serial ports (Got BSOD 0XD1)
JIRA issues:
MAITAI-1190 - Release Maitai 0.15
MAITAI-1229 - Send announcement and post on confluence
MAITAI-1056 - [RFE]Add "Process Description" to process search
Brew Builds:
virtio-win-1.1.16-1.el6

item.title: Comment from Vadim Rozenfeld (vrozenfe@redhat.com)
item.description: virtio-win drivers for rhel 6.1.0

item.title: Comment from Lawrence Lim (llim@redhat.com)
item.description: Changed QE owner from Virt QE (virt-bugs@redhat.com) to Nicole Dai (ndai@redhat.com)

item.title: Comment from Jay Greguske (jgregusk@redhat.com)
item.description: Product changed from Red Hat Enterprise Linux to Red Hat Enterprise Linux Extras

item.title: Comment from Vadim Rozenfeld (vrozenfe@redhat.com)
item.description:
new virtio-win drivers for testing:
http://download.lab.bos.redhat.com/devel/RHEV/virtio-win/1.1.19/

item.title: Comment from Qunfang Zhang (qzhang@redhat.com)
item.description:
Hi, Vadim
Seems this bug need to be added to this errata, right?
616685 - balloon:window guest can not keep memory change after guest restart

item.title: Comment from Qunfang Zhang (qzhang@redhat.com)
item.description:
And also this one.
670713 - (virtio-win-1.1.17)Virtio serial driver always causes windows BSOD when install or run whql jobs.

item.title: Comment from Vadim Rozenfeld (vrozenfe@redhat.com)
item.description:
Hi, Qunfang
Unfortunately, I cannot do it for ON_QA bugs. I can add only bugs marked as VERIFIED | MODIFIED.

item.title: Comment from Lawrence Lim (llim@redhat.com)
item.description:
Noticed one more while reviewing:
Bug 634828 - hal.dll file is missing after quit winxp guest several time

Bug 616685 - balloon:window guest can not keep memory change after guest restart - QE can move to MODIFED if Vadim bz permission is not yet setup

Bug 670713 - (virtio-win-1.1.17)Virtio serial driver always causes windows BSOD when install or run whql jobs. - QA Ack provided, so once it move from ASSIGNED to MODIFIED, Vadim will be able to add.

item.title: Comment from Vadim Rozenfeld (vrozenfe@redhat.com)
item.description:
The following new bugs have been added:
bug 634828 - hal.dll file is missing after quit winxp guest several time

item.title: Comment from Qunfang Zhang (qzhang@redhat.com)
item.description:
Hi, Vadim
According to Comment 8, I have change the Bug 616685 to MODIFIED. Could you help to add it and change to ON_QA then?
Thanks.

item.title: Comment from Qunfang Zhang (qzhang@redhat.com)
item.description:
Hi, Vadim
According to Comment 8, I have change the Bug 616685 to MODIFIED. Could you help to add it and change to ON_QA then?
Thanks.

Hi, Vadim
Could you help to change the status from NEW_FILES to QE, then I will change some bug status from ON_QA to VERIFIED.

Thanks.

item.description:
Hi, Qunfang

Unfortunately, NEW_FILES it the only option I can choose from.

Best Regards,
Vadim.

item.title: Comment from Radek BÃ­ba (rbiba@redhat.com)
item.description: The bug can't be added until it's fully approved. It's missing pm_ack.
